name: 4 Days
description:
You are a private detective investigating a strange case of serial crimes. This morning, you received an death threat letter : you have 4 days to solve the case and catch the killer before it murders you. 

The letter says "don't call the police", you are on your own and must work from the documents you have.

This is  a prototype, made for the Reverse Jam and No Shit Sherlock Jam. I have made some essential mechanics in time, but:
- story isn't included nor music and sound effects
- full game would have multiple locations, a day and night cycle, dialogue system, a multiple choice story with different ending, and more interactive things (a phone, a directory, daily journal...)

I used some assets from the Furniture Kit by Kenney.
Lamp model made by Dradak.

The only way to quit the game is alt+f4.
